values: Can Joy Come in Sorrow? Lessons for an Authentic Christian LifeCan Joy Come in Sorrow? Lessons for an Authentic Christian Life

How do joy and sorrow mingle in the Christian life? Does joy come only after sorrow passes, or can it come in the very midst of our griefs?How do joy and sorrow mingle in the Christian life? Does joy come only after sorrow passes, or can it come in the very midst of our griefs?
